title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6023.6 - Exemptions from instructor certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6023.6 - Exemptions from instructor certification

State Regulations

Upon written request, the requirement mandating
instructor certification may be waived by the commissioner if he or she finds
the applicant is qualified by background and experience to serve as an
instructor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6023.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
